segments.text: My dear , it's five flights up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right.We ' ll get used to it.Besides , it is quiet up there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're little further away from the street and traffic noise
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And there's no one living over us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's pretty bright in there and big enough for our children to play .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The stove and refrigerator are in good working order ,
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I don't see any loose electric wiring that could cause fires .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The toilet flushes and the shower has hot and cold water
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And the sinks don't seem to leak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The place is OK . Let's go there and have a look at it again .
segments.speaker: S2
